free_txt: Corrections in the REACTION coding in SAN
SAN 1, data in sAN 4-12 rearranged into new ones.
ASSUM1 and ASSUM2 in SAN 17-25 into ASSUM3
Assumed in SAN 001 into MONITOR converted.
ASSUM3 and ASSUM4 in SAN 17-25 into ASSUM1
Energy moved from SAN 001 to proper SUBENTs.
Free text was corrected to be "human-readable".
MONIT1 and MONIT2 was moved from Subent 001 into
proper Subents (elastic cross sections) under codes
Authors list corrected as given in English

initial compilation as checked in archives.
Assembly of proportional counters filled with
Manganese filter - metallic Mn of 11.16 g/cm**2 in
aluminum container of 2.46 mm wall thickness.

measurements for different sample thicknesses and for
three variants of geometry (table 2 of reference).
